item.title: 2018 CRF Special Interest Group
item.description: The second article I wrote about ARVO 2018. CRF Special Interest Group at ARVO 2018 The CRF organized and hosted a special session at the annual meeting of the Association for Research in Vision and Ophthalmology (ARVO) to discuss Choroideremia. This special session, organized by CRF president Dr. Chris Moen, was attended by over 100 researchers and clinicians. The discussion featured a panel consisting of Dr. Jacque Duncan, Dr. David Birch, Dr.
